title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Basic concepts of management, Evolution of management thought, Management factors: Planning, Organizing, Leadership, Motivation and Control. Organization and management of business and industry in India: Evolution, long and short term perspective for growth, Diversification in the context of changing environment: Social, economic, technological, etc. Productivity; Definitions, Scope and measurement, Productivity improvement methods for organizations in India. Books •Production Systems, Planning Analysis and Control, James L. Riggs, John Wiley •Essentials of Management, Koontz and O’Donnel, Mcgraw-Hill •Operations Management, Kostas, N. Dervitsiotis •Modern Production Management, Elwood S. Buffa, Wiley Eastern
